text:
Tyler Robert Joseph (born December 1, 1988) is an American singer-songwriter, musician, rapper, and record producer. He is best known as the frontman for the musical duo Twenty One Pilots, alongside bandmate Josh Dun.
As a member of Twenty One Pilots, he has been nominated for six Grammy Awards, of which he has won one.
Personal life.
In 2015, he married Jenna Black.
Jenna announced that the couple's first child, a daughter named Rosie Robert Joseph, was born on February 9, 2020.
